text: Anqasi (Quechua for cobalt salt used for dyeing, hispanicized spelling Angasi) is a mountain in the Andes of Peru, about high. It is situated in the Ayacucho Region, Lucanas Province, Cabana District. It lies north of a mountain named Inka Wasi. == References == Category:Mountains of Peru Category:Mountains of Ayacucho Region
title: Anqasi (Ayacucho)
